name: My Pony adventure in Candy Wor
name_original: My Pony adventure in Candy Wor
description:
If you are a fan of mlp and pony sisters?, Then, welcome.. You're in the right place !!
Pony Adventures is a super magical adventure and fantasy side-scrolling unicorn platformer.

"My little pony in Candy World" is a new, addicting arcade game, that will entertain you for a long time and challenge you immensely.
Welcome to funny candy world, where cute flying little horses and bad unicorns live together.
Are you ready to test your reflexes in this awesome adventure arcade game?

Features:
Thrilling and challenging pegasus jungle adventure hit
Magical pony Jump And Run obstacles / platform runner
Horse game especially for kids, girls and boys, but also adults
Gameplay with easy one tap game control

How to play Pony Adventures:
Just tap on screen to make your unicorn jump or fly
